sentences.en: Actually, this packing is both shockproof and damp - proof.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 这种包装既防震又防潮.

sentences.en: All sorts of electrical LCD shockproof foot ring , E . G: games motor ring.
sentences.cn: 各种电子LCD防震垫圈游戏机,电机(马达)垫圈.

sentences.en: Although you can go swimming with this shockproof and water-resistant watch, be sure to dry the USB connector before plugging it into your PC.
sentences.cn: 这款腕表能够防震、防水，你可以戴着它去游泳，但是，回来之后你必须把USB的接口弄干才可以插到你的个人电脑上。
加布里埃尔的手表是防震的.

sentences.en: High wearproof, Sourproof and shockproof wear - resisting coat.
sentences.cn: 高耐磨、耐冲刷和抗冲击 耐磨 涂层.

sentences.en: Mr Jones: shockproof, rustproof, dustproof, and unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 琼斯先生: 防震, 防锈, 防尘并且摔不坏.

sentences.en: My watch is shockproof and waterproof.
Please try our new products, all in stainless steel, water resistant, antimagnetic and shockproof.
sentences.cn: 请试用本厂新产品, 全不锈钢, 防水 、 防磁、防震.

sentences.en: Shockproof additive is added order to restrict the shrinkage at temperature and the formation of crazing.
sentences.cn: 加入防缩剂,防止衬体在高温下因烧结而产生收缩,导致龟裂的现象.

sentences.en: Strictly follow the principle of " four precautions ". That is, Shockproof , Fireproof, heatproof and Oilproof.
sentences.cn: 答:切实做好 “ 四防 ”:防震 、 防火 、 防热、防油.

sentences.en: The dial are equipped with shockproof mechanism to ensure the reliable accuracy and long tool life.
sentences.cn: 百分表具有防震机构,使用寿命长,精度可靠.

sentences.en: The eggs are packed in cartons lined with shockproof corrugated paperboard.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋将使用防震的瓦楞纸排列于纸箱内包装.

sentences.en: The results were basis for the shockproof packaging design of straw foamed packaging cushions.
sentences.cn: 所得结论,为麦秆发泡包装衬垫的防振包装设计提供依据.

sentences.en: The utility model has a better shockproof and shock resistant ability.
sentences.cn: 有更好的防震、抗冲击性能.

sentences.en: VCD , loader shockproof foot , computer harddisk foot , electrical fixed plate.
sentences.cn: 机芯防震垫 、 电脑硬盘垫圈、电子板固定吸盘.

trans.tran_en: a watch, machine etc that is shockproof is designed so that it is not easily damaged if it is dropped or hit
